itunes:title: Episode 081: Rahne Sinclair (feat. Rebecca Gault)
title: Episode 081: Rahne Sinclair (feat. Rebecca Gault)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 81 of CEREBRO, Connor and fantasy scholar Rebecca Gault howl at the moon with Rahne Sinclair, the wailing Wolfsbane! Introduced as the ingénue of the classic New Mutants, repressed religious Rahne would go on to become one of the X-Men franchise's absolute messiest characters.

The CEREBRO character file on Wolfsbane begins at 1:14:18.

(Content Advisory: Rahne's story includes child abuse, brainwashing, slavery, involuntary body modification, an inappropriate relationship between a teacher and a student, suicide, cannibalism, mystical pregnancy, homophobia, the loss of a child, and allegorical transphobic violence.)

Thanks to ComiXology for sponsoring the pod! You can sign up for a free trial here.



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
